subject: Re: Book suggestions for translation.
msgSnippet: ... Ok, so I ve decided that I shall translate The Wizard Of Oz .  I will use international spellings according to my old proposal- see files:/International
messageBody:
--- In Read_Alphabet@yahoogroups.com, "peter_r_guinness" <bacedif@...> wrote:
>
> I'm thinking about translating another book to QS for use as beginner's practise reading material.
>
> .....


Ok, so I've decided that I shall translate "The Wizard Of Oz". I will use international spellings according to my old proposal- see files:/International Quikscript/Malt's International Quikscript Project. I will use the Thoth_Int* font and consult the Longman's Pronunciation Dictionary for spellings that I'm uncertain of. It hope it will only take 4-6 weeks.

*Thoth_Int is just Thoth font which I extended with additional characters and remapped to different keys
